review_body: Like consumer reports and reddit had a baby Ok, first off, I don‚Äôt do a lot of reviews unless something catches my attention that is of exceptional value. Product hunt is that app.  It keeps me on top of the tech scene by letting me know what is the hottest things (or about to become) in tech, books, software and more. It has a voluntary community that curates things that get voted up or down, so there is a democratic process administered by the internet, it‚Äôs like consumer reports and reddit had a baby.

The most productive infinite scroll out there I‚Äôm a product designer and thusly just love Product Hunt in general. I‚Äôm glad that they introduced a solid mobile experience so I can stay connected and inspired even when I‚Äôm indisposed. üòú

I appreciate so much about the PH website, but ... ... this app, well...  New products, apps, websites, services: Product Hunt delivers. And that the makers participate in the discussions is pure gold to me. My first impressions of this new app are 1) please don‚Äôt make my eyes hurt, grey on lighter grey would be tough even for a kitty; 2) it's crashed a couple of times in the past 15 minutes; 3) where are the categories/tabs? All I see are new products, listed from mewest (actual typo, but I just have to leave it) first. Probably a bit of fine tuning ‚Äúunder the hood‚Äù would make it better than ever. (P.S. I‚Äôm setting up my new laptop and it doesn‚Äôt have a single kitty sticker on it. Sad, so sad.)

Horrible update I am a very long product hunt user, which makes writing this review that much harder. Huge fan of PH and the community and platform they have built. Their last app was not amazing, but it was pretty good and got the job done. This app is absolutely useless. Not sure if the problems are only on iPhone X or all devices, but it‚Äôs literally unusable. I open the app and click on a product and nothing happens for a few seconds. Then the page opens, the app bugs out, and everything I try to click is unresponsive. This update is so bad that I have found myself using PH on my mobile browser or just not checking it at all.

Missing potential I like product hunt and what it does for browsing cool products. However, the app is actually really bad. It‚Äôs super unresponsive, tons of bugs which cause crashing, sluggish and constantly reads my touches/swipes incorrectly.

Great design, effectivity, and usefulness. I found Product Hunt a few months ago, on Google. I started using it on my desktop/laptop and subscribed to their mailing list. I then realized they had a mobile app and realized I can take this on the go. It was really great to see the development of the mobile app and then taking feedback from users and actually implementimg them. The company owners and adminstrators are also friendly and I love how they shed light on these startups and cool programs/tools.
Best place to find new products and trends I often find myself searching ProductHunt first when looking for products to use, or I research.
Good content, but terrible iOS app The developers must have thought it a good idea to implement their own scroll view.. then failed miserably at it.

Can‚Äôt login with Google? I love Product Hunt and have always used the web version, and have just discovered the app. However, on the web version I‚Äôm able to login with my Google account (which is what my entire account relies on); on the app version, I only see the options to login with Twitter and Facebook which means I can‚Äôt access my account.

Tech Guru of Startups 5min/day to capture a ton info on latest startups, new features and the talk of the town. You‚Äôll find everyone from C level execs and the brightest SWE here talking about what‚Äôs good and what not. A quick look at the daily tab gives me a good info on what‚Äôs new, what‚Äôs trending, and what‚Äôs worth buying/paying for. I would highly recommend NOT wasting time on buying expensive tech magazines. PH is the key to your tech house!
A place to connect Product Hunt is not only a place to find new products, but a place to find entrepreneurs to talk with, build with, and share with.

What I needed I enjoy reading about new products, but don‚Äôt always have the time to follow everything. With PH I get to not only read about new products but also interact with others about said products. It makes my life easier and it‚Äôll do the same for you if you‚Äôre like me. Great job PH TEAM!

Amazing! - Just needs a bit more. I recently downloaded the ProductHunt mobile app update a while back, it is amazing! I‚Äôm loving the dark mode and just being able to upvote new launches üõ†üöÄ. But one thing I think it is missing is being able to check your Ship Subscription üö£‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. I think that being able to manage this and your launches would be awesome! üòÄ

Overall great package I‚Äôm a huge fan of PH it‚Äôs the number one thing I do as soon as I get to my office in the morning, the app is fast and pretty easy to get used to but there could be some improvements in the navigation system sometimes swipes as misinterpreted :(

My goto App for all Startups! Product Hunt is an addiction and with an enhanced mobile app it further grows that addiction because I can find all the new best products and startups where ever I go!  The app is simple and that's all that is needed when I'm sitting on the toilet or even walking on the treadmill. This app helps me discover the best apps and products instantly!

The holy grail for makers The best part about the product hunt app is the fact that it‚Äôs well...an app! If you‚Äôre on the go and want to keep updated on the latest web apps, App Store apps, devices, platforms etc. Then it‚Äôs the best place to stay updated on the best digital and physical tech based products. If you‚Äôre a techie, entrepreneur, or just tech fiend then download the app and join the tight product hunt community.

The app experience Is a bit laggy and not the same as the website which I use daily. I wish you can filter out all of the apps to just showcase iOS apps on the iPhone this way you don‚Äôt have to deal with a bunch of slow loading formats instead it takes you right to the App Store. Overall I love this company, but the app needs a little work :)

Memory issues The new design looks great but this app has some sort of memory issues. It runs fine on the first couple launches but then the animations will slow down like crazy. I‚Äôll click on a product and about 30 seconds later, a jittery opening animation will slowly start. Once I force close the app it works correctly for a little bit. I‚Äôll be glad to send screen recordings if it‚Äôll help investigating the issue. I‚Äôm on an iPhone X so I didn‚Äôt really expect to see performance issues with a simple app like this. Hope it gets fixed.

Good but needs fixing... Product Hunt is a great community for finding the next big thing whether it be apps, websites, products, etc... however the latest update isn‚Äôt too great; the looks and functionality is fine but I‚Äôm constantly logged out every single day and I constantly have to delete the app and reinstall because It crashes and won‚Äôt open. I‚Äôve gone to using using the mobile site because the app has been so buggy. PLEASE FIX!!!

Disappointed Long time PH user here, sad to say that I am extremely disappointed in PH mobile. Since they redesigned the app, it seems like all the functionality went down the drain. There‚Äôs barely anything left to do on the app, as a matter of fact, why do we need the app anymore? Why can‚Äôt I browse categories? Why can‚Äôt I view my notifications without it flickering and never showing me the notifications? Why do some products never load even though I‚Äôm certain I have a stable connection. So much wasted potential here. Will uninstall until they release a new version.

Slick! Love that everything was streamlined. There's so much to see and browse through when it comes to the products and the app is built to get out of your way and let you explore. I do wish though that force touch would work though.

Awesome app. Product Hunt keeps on surprising me: they carefully listen to the feedback from the community and the user experience of this new mobile app is the digital proof of that. With a clean design, great UX, the right amount of features to discover products quickly on my daily commute.

Love Product Hunt, but mobile is now limited. I love Product Hunt, but lately the mobile version seems to be limited. It‚Äôs seems you can no longer search by categories, and now the search is only for a specific thing. Still, I love product hunt and I love browsing for new things!

Garbage, barely usable The new design is nice and all but the tradeoff here is a significant one - performance. The app freezes regularly and the card view often takes double digit seconds to load, if it loads at all. View refresh requires a force kill more than occasionally. The list goes on but, at the end of the day, the application is broken.

App is full of bugs. This app used to be decent but ever since the last redesign it has been absolutely horrible. I constantly get logged out and have to sign back in via Twitter. I can‚Äôt even view my profile; Tapping my profile icon crashes the app. The notifications page is unreliable and is currently flashing like it‚Äôs having a seizure and is completely unusable. Better off just visiting the website at this point.
Great site, not so great app I love PH. Truly. But the app is not so great;
Glitchy Hey Product Hunt,

Screen bumping up on scroll When scrolling down through days (today>yesterday etc), the screen will bump up when you scroll down, causing you to lose your place and need to scroll back down. The further down you scroll into past days, the more it happens. Just a quick bug report as otherwise Product Hunt is great.

Love the concept The app is great in theory, unfortunately it doesn‚Äôt persist your location in the scroll view so when you hit a product and then go back to it you have to scroll back down to where you were previously. Would love to not have to do that. Also, a fair amount of network errors pop up - on wifi and LTE. Other than that it does what it‚Äôs supposed to do.
Still crashes daily Update: years later and this is still the most frustratingly unstable apps I use.

Incredibly useful This is a great app. I‚Äôd have missed out on so many new services (and so many pre order discounts) if I wasn‚Äôt on Product Hunt. The services I‚Äôve found on this platform have helped me immensely with my work (launchaco was a lifesaver). To the team at PH, I‚Äôd say keep up the good work, and never stop using the Google Glass cat as your mascotüê±.

Easiest way to keep up with what‚Äôs new! The technology industry moves at a fast pace and keeping up with where things are going takes a lot of effort. Product Hunt makes it easy to see what tomorrow‚Äôs makers are building.

Love Product Hunt! I've been a Product Hunt user for years! I don't even know how many of my most loved apps were first discovered on PH. If you're an early adopter or someone who loves great tools, you definitely should check it out!

The best app to discover new tech products PH is an excelente place to keep up with the latest products on the tech scene. Also, you can publish your own product and receive feedback from the community, LOVE IT!

Keeps you ahead of the curve. I‚Äôve been following product hunt for some time now and the app is awesome. I love the ratings of the app of the day and just the variety of apps you can look at in one place.

Daily rotation The PH is in my daily rotation. There‚Äôs no better place to see community support and surface the best and new digital apps, podcast, books and more. Definitely worth downloading if you love trying new things.

Must download Product hunt is the perfect app if you‚Äôre looking for new apps to try or if you are a maker of things and want to get your product out there, whether it‚Äôs an app, book, gadget or whatever.

Cannot use on iPhone X Even with latest update. If you click into a product, app locks up and phone begins to overheat. I have to force quit the app. The app has been like this for over a month or so now and no update has addressed this issue. Multiple people have mentioned it. I have saved a safari bookmark to my home screen which works just fine and I can actually view ProductHunt without my phone overheating!

My go-to app every morning Do I drink coffee? No. I use Product Hunt. Discovering the best products from around the world is my favorite way to wake up every morning, and their new iOS app is the bomb dot com.

Love PH BUT, recent version is a problem Since the latest update, I get constantly logged out and have to keep reconnecting my twitter account. Most times the app stalls out while trying to connect to the twitter login screen.

Basically non-functional I üòç PH. It‚Äôs a daily activity to see what everyone is making and connect with the makers directly. The community is full of great insights. HOWEVER, the new app is down right unusable. It‚Äôs horrid in the way it loads data, locking up the UI, and making it so a 2 second interaction takes more like 2 minutes. For a team who is focused on helping people launch product people love, this is disheartening.

Love PH App! I use PH every morning on my phone for ‚Äúwake up‚Äù inspiration for the day. Love the app for quick browsing, sharing, and saving. Have it 4 stars as I occasionally experience screen load lags on iOS. But, overall, one of my fave apps!
New UI The new app UI is great and fast for navigating through new products that are launched every day. I especially like the easy way I can swipe through the products via cards. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Part of my morning ‚Äúroutine‚Äù Love me some PH. The iOS app is part of my morning app checks. Overall very happy, just wish it had a bit more features inline with the website.

For startup enthusiasts I literally look at this app or site every day. If startups excite you, this is the app for you. It‚Äôs incredible the amount of cool products I‚Äôve found only from using this app.
Product Hunt rocks!- Product Hunt is my favorite place to learn about and connect with other makers. The tools I've found on PH are tremendous. The app makes the experience only better.

Great community for up and coming startups to gain traction If you love discovering new products and being in a community of people that enjoy creating new products, this is the app you‚Äôve been looking for.

I bet someone made it... Most of the time I‚Äôm browsing PH looking for ideas, sometimes seeing if something already exists. 9/10 times I‚Äôm late to the game but love it! The community is awesome and welcoming, a great thing to have!

Keep Your Finger On The Pulse of Tech If you‚Äôre trying to learn more about tech or startups, look no further. This app combined with their daily news letter will help you stay up to date on all the goings-on of the tech industry and see new trends before they go mainstream.
An awesome resource for all things ‚ÄúProduct‚Äù Simple UX. Consistent content. This easily-digestible feed brings you all the latest Product updates you need.

Great but missing something The app is great. Reading descriptions about the product. Upvoting if you like the product. That‚Äôs all great. But I want to see what my upvotes are and need categories like the website. The idea is brilliant but missing a few things.
Long timer PH user I‚Äôve been using PH for years and love it. The new mobile app has removed the bloat and I love how fast it now is. Keep up the good work!

Love the app, still needs a lot of work The layout of the app is great. But it still feels kinda clunky and slow. Pages take a while to appear and lags when transitioning. Can't wait to see the improvements
Must-have! The only app I use to stay updated with the latest product news.
Great way to stay on top of tech I use product hunt every day to keep up with new products and ideas people are shipping out to the world. Great daily digest
Great app to stay informed! I love the Product Hunt app to stay informed and involved with daily product launches while on the go. A must for anyone who uses Product Hunt!

Buggy on iPhone X Buggy as all hell on the iPhone X. It‚Äôs a shame because the app is on my second home screen and I open it at least once a day, but often times tapping into a product causes it to freeze and I have to then force close+reload. Easier at that point just to go to the web page.

Incredibly buggy and lost all my hunts The most recent update managed to remove all my hunts I had saved and made Facebook the only way to log in. UX is a little buggy as well. Clicking on some ‚Äúget it‚Äù links crash the app. The app before the update was amazing, Not sure what happened here.

Please re-design iPad Pro layout Hey guys, as for now it‚Äôs ugly with huge empty blocks and over structured in a 20% of the display. It makes it not just unattractive but very UX-unfriendly, especially upper block with photos and video.
Frustrating Auto scrolling I use this app often, but it seems to constantly auto scroll me back to the top after I have scrolled down through a few days of product hunt results.
What would I do without Product Hunt? As a Designer/ Developer it is important to keep up with the latest tools and products PH is a life saver!!!
New Products in my pocket! Love it. Always a new product to discover each day and get inspired over.
Vitalii Vashchuk PM I use product hunt to observe the latest product ideas. It‚Äôs a really good place to check things on the fly
Always discovering new things Product hunt allows me to be more productive and jump on the latest trends in tech. Love this app!

Bring back old layout Not a fan of new layout. Experiencing all sorts of bugs with delays and the app automatically shutting down. I love what the app is all about, but it‚Äôs less usable since the new update.
Many bugs Hey guys

Bad app Crashes. Makes phone get super hot. Most importantly.. as a long time fan of Product Hunt.. it is very upsetting that because I do not have Twitter or Facebook, I am not able to sign into my account on the app with my gmail account like I normally would in their website. PLEASE FIX.

Somewhat functional Main nav and product exploration is there but you can‚Äôt create collections and notifications are totally broken and keep glitching in and out with the placeholder graphic. +1 for dark mode!
App needs improvement for a really great site There‚Äôs no Google sign in and finding the actual discussion page is confusing. Overall I love the site but this app needs improvement.
Love it as a maker and as a consumer But please fix the commenting. When I type on my iPhone, each letter appears for a split second, than erases itself.
Everyday usage! I really enjoy PH as a regular destination on my phone. It's cool to be inspired by what is put out there and really fun to give feedback to founders just starting up. Great stuff!
Comfortable app to check PH from mobile. I like simplicity of user interface and how good it works. All what I need.
Great App Product Hunt is the place to learn about new cool things. It helps keep you up to date on all tech stuff!
Useful I use Product Hunt adds to google chrome, and this app is very similar. Well done!
Best thing since stumble upon Product hunt is a great place to find new companies or get traction if you‚Äôre a new company. :)
I love PH... but the app is too buggy... I can‚Äôt seem to be able to load the hunts, it stays on a black screen. iPhone X, and I‚Äôve even deleted/reinstalled the app..

Still unusable. Huge PH fan. But this app is, at times, completely unusable. Don't bother tapping for details or upvoting from the main screen‚Äì they can take as long as 2 minutes to actually show up.
Keeps Crashing Love this app but disappointed because whenever I click on my profile it immediately crashes:/ ?

Must have Twitter or Facebook If you don‚Äôt have a Twitter or Facebook account then you cannot use this app. And I have neither so I am going to delete it. It looked like it would be nice app, but I don‚Äôt want a Facebook or Twitter account...So it‚Äôs useless for me. Life is hard enough without the drama that those 2 apps bring.
App is Glitchy When I go to my notifications the app starts glitching and does not let me see what notifications I have. I tried removing and reinstalling the app but get the same issue.
Easy peasy I enjoy the new update. It's simple yet effective. I'm not looking for super custom feeds. I just want to see cool stuff. ü§òüèº
App update The updated app works so much better
Best place to learn about new products Love the feeling of contributing and learning from new product launches!
So handy I love the new updates. It‚Äôs so much faster. I really appreciate that it syncs too! Well done.
One of a kind As a app developer/product designer, this is the place I love to visit every day.
Best App for all startups You will find the perfect community for your business
Great way to track latest products Good design, awesome company, great extension of the website.
Where I go for the latest! Love the new app to stay on top of the latest and greatest. New design is much easier to navigate!
Product feed Make up your mind
Scrolling is completely broken The app will not scroll back further than 2 days without re-loading the same day‚Äôs content you‚Äôve already seen. Completely useless.
IPhone X keep locking up ui I like the new design and swiping between products but it keeps becoming unresponsive to my touches when I browse.
It‚Äôs alright Sometimes slow, going through cards it buggy. Would appreciate LastPass integration too.
Love it As an entrepreneur I love seeing what other makers are up to and the energy is just amazing
Ocean The latest, coolest products that can inspire you. Also the best place for constructive feedback at scale.
Buggy and Slow This app has some issues that cause it to become unresponsive nearly every time I use it. It‚Äôs a far worse experience than using the web version. Please fix it.
Misses all the little things I love Product Hunt but the app continuously fails at the little things providing a frustrating experience. Some examples:

Barely works now Love the app and the community. However with the latest update the app never stays logged in and this makes it nearly impossible to use. Sad to see an app that was once great become barely useable.
Buggy Just signed up for an account. Pretty bad experience full of bugs. Don‚Äôt care for having to log in via desktop, and the mobile view is restrictive on what you can do anyways.
Poor iOS app App with its poor design choices is extremely annoying to use. There is no swipe to back, among other things. Really?

Can't login with Google The concept is nice and the app seems fine, but there's no login with Google or manual sign-in... My account is linked with Google so I can't access it, so it's essentially useless.
New version not usable This new version is not usable. I cannot browse more than one product before it crashes.
Light gray tiny text is hard to read I can‚Äôt read tiny light gray text! Who came up with such a disaster of a font.
It is a good app This is a great product that where you can find a lot of new product.
Glitchy and Slow New update is very unresponsive and slow. When I click to view a product the app often does not respond.
Latest version is buggy Love the app in general but this latest version has bugs and hardly works for me.
Logs me out every other session Every other time I open this app it makes me log back in through Twitter when I try and upvote. iPhone X. Please fix this.

Shoddy native app I like the site but the native app is barely usable. Lots of empty screens, superfluous stacking, broken screens that redraw incessantly. How much care is going into this product? Even the app history copy feels shoddy: ‚ÄúAdress [sic] frequent signout.‚Äù (4.3.3)

Position jumps and you lose where you are. The app is a feed, the app cannot maintain your position in that feed, every minute the feed jumps up 4 days worth of projects. Seriously dislike their new react native direction.
Crashes Cool and all but it crashes every time i go to my profile. Fix for max stars :D
Too many bugs Can‚Äôt scroll down, it won‚Äôt allow me after some point.
Paw-some update Love PH, and this app is even better with iPhone X support! üòª
Coolest app One of the coolest app to hunt latest apps, startups, devices.. loving it.. keep up the good work
Great way to find new tech Love the app
Awesome Great products every day
Clean, cool UI Nice UI, very easy to use. Prefer the web version, though!
Must-have app for PM Clean & easy to follow up content. This is a must have app for all PM.

Sev 1 defects in app I love PH, but the app has glaring defects for me. On iPhone 5 SE the login buttons for Twitter and Facebook do not work. Clicking contact customer support leads to a "not_available" message. Please fix your sev 1 defects and I'll update my review to a 5 star :)
App keeps scrolling up, glitching I can‚Äôt keep binging on the app because it randomly shoots me up to a different part of the feed. Extremely annoying.
Miserable experience You scroll down, the app scrolls you back up.  Impossible to look beyond one day! How can a P1 bug be around for months and not fixed!?  It‚Äôs not Product Hunt but People Trap
Disappointment for sure Year 2019 and a simple app like this one is still buggy and lacks core functionality.
What happened? I love Product Hunt, but the app is barely useable now. When I touch an entry to see it, nothing happens. I‚Äôm using an iPhone X. Maybe it‚Äôs incompatible? Yuck.
Unusable Pretty much unusable. Crashes and
üòªüòªüòª Keep up the great work!
Great Big fan of the new app. Keep up the good work PH...
Just another review Is it sad I‚Äôm only writing this for the free P.H. Stickers üòÇ
Great App Sleek app with a modern UI and great functionality
Unstable Crashes every time. Notifications in the app are broken too.
Eh Just not featured enough. What kind of product hunt app doesn't let you hunt?
Can‚Äôt log in Downloaded app and tried logging in via Facebook, but the wheel spins forever and I can‚Äôt log in
No google sign in You need to implement simple email and password!

Finally Got Logged In, But... So the Twitter Log-in finally works (!) but the app itself is still a little too bare bones. Obviously fixing the Twitter bug wouldn't resolve that, but I would like to see the experience become a little more visual (ie--thumbnails of products/sites instead of just headlines). I also wish the default view was for the site/product link, and not the people up-voting. Which is more important for this experience? And Pocket support would be quite lovely. I guess I'm just being critical because this concept of a service is very cool and something I've wanted for a long time.

Potentially Cool I could potentially come to love this app but right now it's too big of a pain in the neck to even bother with.  The "Details" tab should provide a few more details than a one line blurb about the product. A photo and price would be ideal :) Then I can more easily determine if it's even worth going to the website for further details. Especially since every time I click on the "website" tab I get the spinning wheel of death forever and end up having to open it in Safari to actually view the product. Add a photo of the product and speed it up and I'll quickly change my rating to 5 stars! ;)

Product Hunt is SO valuable!!! I didn't know how badly I needed Product Hunt until I found Product Hunt! The digg-like list of new apps is so valuable because it's curated by people who think critically about tech - I know I'm only seeing stuff worth knowing about.

Great product and community get a worthy app I'm a big Product Hunt aficionado, and though most of my activities of the site involve lurking rather than posting and commenting, I love what Ryan and team are building.

I'm a startup nut and I love PH and the awesome community As a maker, I like to build products and create things that empower other entrepreneurs. PH has honestly allowed me to share my passion with other like minded people from all over the world. From Digital nomads living in Bangkok to Silicon Valley techies and all the way down to the Silicon Beach bros of LA. This revamped version of the app is executed flawlessly and has many great features. One of my favorites is the much awaited feature to add products to your "collections". You can also now reply to comments and the overall flow of the app is smoother and the animations are oh so slick. Mad props to the IOS Engineers who put this together and a big shoutout to the PH team which is near and dear to my nerdy heart.

Cool Concept but how do I personalize? I really like the the concept of this however it is still in the social media category. Given this, do not forget to identify with all of your personas most importantly, the social aspect to each. I want to be able to update my profile picture and the background image so that I can further identify myself socially on this app. Given that I utilize the Twitter sign on when I log onto your app, then my images automatically transfer from Twitter to Product Hunt. I do not like that they cannot be different then what is on Twitter. I hope I'm just missing how to update this. Thanks for any assistance and future updates to allow this!
Wish I hadn't updated - new layout is not user friendly Nooooooo :(
App not responsive :/ Bummer
How ironic! The app is very buggy!
Pain to use Zero UX, slow, sad!

Proud Product Hunter Product Hunt has been one of my favorite websites for the last few months, and now it's one of my favorite apps. This is a startup made up of great people building great things. If you're into tech, design, and product in general, you need to download this app.

Bugs Cool but it crashes every time I try to connect to Twitter which is required before you can use most of the app's features.  Also, if you're viewing a previous day's products, click on a product, then navigate back to the product list page, the page refreshes and only loads the current day's products.  You then have to manually load each day's product list to get back to where you left off.

Excellent app to keep up on tech Product hunt is hands down the best way to keep up to date with the latest apps and products being released. The app is beautifully designed and has a great community of developers and founders that post.

Get this today. Must have if you use the site all day! Do you browse the web and end up with 50 open tabs by the end of the day? Find that you are the person everyone comes to for app recommendations? This is for you. It's like Ryan took what I do all day and packages it into one simple, yet addictive package. Download it already.

The New App You'll Always Have Open Product Hunt is the sole app you need if tech interests you even the slightest bit. I used their web interface for some time and immediately downloaded the app once it came out. Once you get it, prepare yourself to never have it closed.

bring back simple list view w no pics! recent update is outstanding, but please bring back OR give me the option to have a simple text only list view! the image sizes in the "today" view are ridiculously huge and it means scrolling takes forever, which means low ranked stuff will be ignored or overlooked

Lots of great functionality, but very laggy Great effort to bring the functionality of the app up to speed with the website. The team did a great job at providing us with a very comprehensive update. However, I'm running an iPhone 6 and the app is very laggy for me. This is pretty much true across the app, but particularly noticeable when swiping between categories. Get rid of the lag and this will be a 5-star app for sure.

Product Hunt is a game changer Kind of like Reddit for cool products & startups. This community is something really special, and the app does some really smart things like letting you listen to a podcast episode while browsing posts. This is now the first thing I open every day.

It‚Äôs beautiful but lacking in a couple things One of the most useful and exciting parts of the previous Product Hunt app was the ability to see similar products. If this application does have that feature I am not able to find it and so therefore it‚Äôs a little bit of the usability and user experience problem.
A downgrade in experience In my opinion, the new design has significantly worse viewing experience than the previous version.

A Must Have If you want the best place to find a curated list of new products, Product Hunt is where it‚Äôs at. The website was great, and the mobile app makes it that much sweeter. This will be my go-to on the product front for a long time.

Clutter less design and speed Same feel as web. No ad. Clutter less design. Handy app for the product hunt regular users. Now it is easy to check the latest product and more over it is easy to post a product also.

Great app with an annoying "feature" I love the app but I hate having to scroll way down, click on a product, then click back only to find myself back at the top of the list. It's pretty annoying having to scroll back down again every time to find out where I was at before. Please fix.
Bad idea to change the design I loved product hunt for its simplicity and lack of clutter.

Neutered and Slimmed Down I think I get what they're trying to do with this update, but it's actually removed helpful functionality. For example, it used to be easy to filter down search by type, which is no longer available. The images and copy take up far too much space, making for a much more tedious browsing experience. Hopefully they can iterate on this new design well.
Poor UX I immediately went to the settings to see if that was an option to disable images in the list view.

We don't need images on main page Product hunt was better when there are list of apps, games with just app name and metadata. The new app focus more on image where the image layout doesn't add any value to product.

THE PLACE to learn about and launch startups ProductHunt has quickly become one of the most important platforms in the startup world. If you want to learn about or discuss new products or are planning on launching your own soon, you need to be here.

Not built for reading, focus on the content Too many useless pictures and too little text. I want to be able to read more than one sentence without having to click on the description of the product. Apple News version of this is ironically better than this dedicated app.

Saving items There could be a better way to save items so that u can go back at a later time to review what you saved. I love the app I jus have difficulty saving the things I'd like to review later like when I'm pressed for time.
Keep an eye on the stream of products It‚Äôs great to be able to get a quick ‚Äòproduct‚Äô fix, and keep on top of the stream of products.

A Must Have For Product Discovery This app surfaces the best and most popular products in a wide range of markets. One of the best parts about the community is that makers contribute to the conversation in an AMA style approach so you can talk to the people behind the product.

Everything we hoped for! If you're a Product Hunt fan, you know how long we've been waiting for an official app. This app will NOT let you down! It is everything we've been hoping for... And THEN some! Awesome! 5 stars!

Awesome and new! I had read about product hunt before through Alexis Ohanian and techcrunch but never knew exactly how great/easy/fun the platform is until I first tried it! Now I love using it when I have time to myself!

The Hunt Download the app now. Just do it. I really don't even know why you are reading reviews, you know you love the hunt and you know you'll love this app. So stop wasting time and install this beast right this second.
I love this app Such a useful app. I find myself browsing it more and more everyday and it's usually one of the first apps I check when I look at my phone in the morning.

Not sure what to think Although the things on the app seem to be pretty handy, it's seems pretty barren. I don't know how many people actively use the app, but I don't think it's a lot. Besides that, the UI is pretty bland and you can only sign up with Twitter. Needs some work.
Thank you for bringing Safari back!! This update brings back the ability for users to open articles in Safari. Thank you for that!

Someone Hunt a UX designer Recent changes to this app have ratcheted up the annoyance factor.  The large "app of the day" wastes screen real estate and I'm a 6+ the animated images will invoke whatever ptsd that online advertising has created in your psyche. I find that now I want to quickly browse new stuff and leave the app asap because it's an eyesore.

No way to add to or access my saved hunts or  lists I've been using PH for what feels like years and I've been categorizing my hunts with lists. With the new update I have no way to either return to my previous lists or add items to lists/save them for accessing later. There used to be a small icon at the top which allowed me to do that and it's gone. Why is that single feature gone? That's a huge miss.

Get your hunt on! Bunch of great products to find. I love the discussion between the makers. High quality community and the dudes who make it are awesome! Only gripe is that its missing edge drag to go back! Peace out!
Best way to kill 1 minute Love opening the app while waiting for the bus or the elevator. 1 minute here and there and I know everything about the latest startups/products.
Had issues with Twitter auth but fixed I had an issue with re-requesting Twitter login but worked with the PH team to address it. Love the app and use it every day.

It's the community behind the app Remember that the key value of Product Hunt is the awesome community. These app updates for PH are works in progress. If you are doing anything with products, design, coding, or startups, you need to participate.

Amazballs So I flip'n love product hunt. It's an amazing place to discover new products and services. I only wish I could post comments and upvote Things without using Twitter. That's my  only complaints. gO PH!

Great App but, it has Sync Issues The app works well, is well designed, but is seems to lag behind the website in keeping my collections and submissions in sync. In other words, the website is always more current and up to date.

Buggy! I love the platform, but this app gave me trouble on my last and now on my current phone, both iPhones. The activity will show, but when I click on it, I don't see anything. Also when I get responses to comments, I get taken back to the product, but not my comment, so I can't respond to comments. This app is useless for me.

‚ù§Ô∏è Product Hunt is an amazing concept, by entrepreneurs for entrepreneurs. I've discovered some amazing tools that helped us a lot to develop our app. Can't stress enough how important this company for entrepreneurs and founders!

Craving more I love PH. I wish the app allowed me to post products that I've hunted on the go. Also it doesn't seem to be syncing properly with my online profile. It only displays one of the products I've hunted? Maybe have set something up wrong I'm not sure.

Description too small. Waste of screen space. This revision is terrible. The description font size are way too small on devices with smaller screens. Too screen real estate is wasted for upvote. The layout is done poorly making user experience the worst ever. Perhaps you should focused on enhancing curation rather than just finding things to do by moving things around.
Great addition to mobile website Finally a great way to stay in touch with all the great new apps!
Great Update Cool new features added! Although I do hate that I can't swipe to go back in the details page, something essential with these big new phones!

Fixing something that wasn't broken It was a great app the way it was. I'm not a fan of screen real  estate being taken up by large useless images. I preferred the list view as it is easier to consume content.

Terrible update Guys the update looks terrible... slow to scroll around, fuzzy pictures, overall I just want to use it less.  The previous version was fantastic... like with Reddit, please add option for "condensed" (classic) view.

the old new look rocks i missed the simple layout of old and I'm glad they brought it back!

Gonna be the next thing!! Forget all the other apps, this one shows promise to go somewhere new..

Strangely Addictive The only way to find software built by smart people from all over the world!

Finally made my home-screen! Can't say enough good things about Ryan, Erik, and their team. I check Product Hunt routinely.
